response: Abby-Mae Parkinson (born 30 July 1997) is an English professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team  in road racing, and UCI Cyclo-cross Team  in cyclo-cross. Her mother Lisa Brambani is a former racing cyclist who won a silver medal in the road race at the 1990 Commonwealth Games. Parkinson rode in the women's road race at the 2016 UCI Road World Championships, finishing in 79th place.
